languages.text: В полустертом рисунке на борту шаттла все еще можно узнать герб фон Валанциус. Часть обшивки и техники выглядит так, будто нечто испаряло фрагменты корабля слой за слоем.

traits.locale_text: Конструкция шаттла не вызывает сомнений: когда-то он принадлежал династии фон Валанциус, но пришел в негодность из-за сильных повреждений.

languages.text: You can still recognise the von Valancius coat of arms in the half-abraded emblem on the side of the shuttle. Parts of the hull and equipment look as if something vaporised the ship's components one layer after another.
languages.original_text: В полустертом рисунке на борту шаттла все еще можно узнать герб фон Валанциус. Часть обшивки и техники выглядит так, будто нечто испаряло фрагменты корабля слой за слоем.

traits.locale_text: You can still recognize the von Valancius coat of arms in the half-abraded emblem on the side of the shuttle. Parts of the hull and equipment look as if something vaporized the ship's components one layer after another.

You can still recognize the von Valancius coat of arms in the half-abraded emblem on the side of the shuttle. Parts of the hull and equipment look as if something vaporized the ship's components one layer after another.

You can still recognise the von Valancius coat of arms in the half-abraded emblem on the side of the shuttle. Parts of the hull and equipment look as if something vaporised the ship's components one layer after another.

languages.text: 穿梭机侧面的标记已经残破不堪，但你依然辨认出那是冯·瓦兰修斯的家族纹章。部分舰体与设备不见了，看起来就像是被什么东西抽丝剥茧般蒸发掉了。
languages.original_text: You can still recognise the von Valancius coat of arms in the half-abraded emblem on the side of the shuttle. Parts of the hull and equipment look as if something vaporised the ship's components one layer after another.

traits.locale_text: 穿梭机侧面的标记已经残破不堪，但你依然辨认出那是冯·瓦兰修斯的家族纹章。部分舰体与设备不见了，看起来就像是被什么东西抽丝剥茧般蒸发掉了。

languages.text: On reconnaît toujours les armoiries des von Valancius sur l'emblème à moitié effacé qui orne le flanc de la navette. À en juger par l'état de la coque et de l'équipement, quelque chose semble avoir vaporisé les composants du vaisseau couche par couche.
languages.original_text: You can still recognise the von Valancius coat of arms in the half-abraded emblem on the side of the shuttle. Parts of the hull and equipment look as if something vaporised the ship's components one layer after another.

traits.locale_text: On reconnaît toujours les armoiries des von Valancius sur l'emblème à moitié effacé qui orne le flanc de la navette. À en juger par l'état de la coque et de l'équipement, quelque chose semble avoir vaporisé les composants du vaisseau couche par couche.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウスの紋章がシャトルの側面にある半分擦れたエンブレムにわずかに残っている。まるで何かが船体や装備品の一部を次々と蒸発させたかのようだ。
languages.original_text: You can still recognise the von Valancius coat of arms in the half-abraded emblem on the side of the shuttle. Parts of the hull and equipment look as if something vaporised the ship's components one layer after another.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウスの紋章がシャトルの側面にある半分擦れたエンブレムにわずかに残っている。まるで何かが船体や装備品の一部を次々と蒸発させたかのようだ。

languages.text: Todavía reconoces el escudo de armas de von Valancius en el emblema desgastado del costado de la lanzadera. Parte del casco y el equipo que contiene parecen haber sido desintegrados capa a capa.
languages.original_text: You can still recognise the von Valancius coat of arms in the half-abraded emblem on the side of the shuttle. Parts of the hull and equipment look as if something vaporised the ship's components one layer after another.

traits.locale_text: Todavía reconoces el escudo de armas de von Valancius en el emblema desgastado del costado de la lanzadera. Parte del casco y el equipo que contiene parecen haber sido desintegrados capa a capa.

languages.text: Du erkennst in dem halb abgeriebenen Emblem auf der Seite des Shuttles noch immer das Wappen derer von Valancius. Teile des Rumpfs und der Ausrüstung sehen aus, als hätte etwas die Komponenten des Schiffs Schicht für Schicht pulverisiert.
languages.original_text: You can still recognise the von Valancius coat of arms in the half-abraded emblem on the side of the shuttle. Parts of the hull and equipment look as if something vaporised the ship's components one layer after another.

traits.locale_text: Du erkennst in dem halb abgeriebenen Emblem auf der Seite des Shuttles noch immer das Wappen derer von Valancius. Teile des Rumpfs und der Ausrüstung sehen aus, als hätte etwas die Komponenten des Schiffs Schicht für Schicht pulverisiert.

languages.text: Mekiğin yan yüzeyinde kalan, yarısı aşınmış amblemdeki von Valancius armasını tanıyorsun. Gövdenin bir kısmı ile bazı ekipmanlar, sanki bir şey geminin bileşenlerini katman katman buharlaştırmış gibi gözüküyor.
languages.original_text: You can still recognise the von Valancius coat of arms in the half-abraded emblem on the side of the shuttle. Parts of the hull and equipment look as if something vaporised the ship's components one layer after another.

traits.locale_text: Mekiğin kenarındaki yarısı aşınmış amblemde Von Valancius armasını tanıyorsun. Gövde ve ekipmanların bazı kısımları, sanki bir şey geminin malzemelerini katman katman buharlaştırmış gibi gözüküyor.
